definition: deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.chinese: 他是詭計多端的老狐狸。

sentences.english: Qian Zhong said wonderful crafty, let cloud crazy to think it over again.
sentences.chinese: 錢忠說妙戈詭計多端，讓雲狂再考慮考慮。

sentences.english: Also the dragon (serpent), earthborn, in craftiness coming behind thee.
sentences.chinese: 龍或蛇，地裏出來的，詭計多端地在你後面出現。

sentences.english: He's a dodgy bloke, I wouldn't trust him an inch.
sentences.chinese: 他是個詭計多端傢伙，我一點都不相信他。

sentences.english: You can be sneaky about the attack.
sentences.chinese: 你可以詭計多端的攻擊。

sentences.english: Despite all his schemes, it looks like the Downton crew really will miss him.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他詭計多端，但好像唐頓莊園的人都會十分想他。
